creditline: Gift of David Tausig Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
description: outer carton is cream paper with a brown stripe pattern; inner wooden box has an inscription on outside and inside of lid; wrapped in tissue; support fabric is green with peach, blue and gold accents; image of a gourd-like vegetable with an orange stem; inscription around gourd with a round, red chop in LL corner
title: Kabocha
